message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,350,000 is fair.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,200,000 is below its true worth. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This price reflects the value this product brings.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to increase my offer to $1,250,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
